channel.title: R on Joe Wright's Github Site
channel.description: Recent content in R on Joe Wright's Github Site

item.title: What was the most valuable position in the NBA during the 2019-2020 season?
item.description: One of the longest held debates amongst NBA fanatics is over which player deserves the Most Valuable Player (MVP) award for each given season. It is a purposefully subjective award that stirs the pot and incites heated arguments between both media members and fans about what value really means in the NBA. While this debate is a fascinating discussion, I want to look at player value in a broader sense.

item.title: Sports Data Analysis and Visualization
item.description: This is a faux post for my website so I can get the hang of posting blogs! For my big project this semester, I’m interested in finding out what position in the NBA is the most important? I want to analyze which position brings a team the most win shares and which players in said positions are outliers. I’m also interested in finding out which position has the best shooting percentages, turnover ratio and more!
